other_tests.findings: Abdominal aortic aneurysm noted, measuring up to 4.6 cm in greatest dimension, gallbladder contains a calculus in the neck measuring approximately 6 mm, a tiny gallbladder polyp, no gallbladder wall edema, no pericholecystic edema, gallbladder wall not thickened, no perihepatic ascites, main portal vein patent, common duct measures 3 mm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The abdominal aortic aneurysm decreased from 5.2 cm previously to 4.6 cm; however, the difference in measurements is likely due to different techniques.
